Description.Text: Conveniently located in the business hub of Atasehir, Plus Hotel Bostanci offers comfortable modern accommodation and is just 10 minutes away from popular Bagdat Street for shopping, 15 minutes away from the Kad?koy entertainment district, and 45 minutes away from the historical attractions of Sultanahmet. There are good connections to other business areas including Maslak and Levent via the nearby metro station, as well as easy access to the E-5 highway. The hotel boasts a spa with a sauna, steam bath and massage services, and there is also a bistro restaurant for breakfast and à la carte dining at both lunch and dinner, featuring a range of international dishes and Turkish specialities. Guestrooms feature modern design and décor and come with a private bathroom, pillow menu, blackout curtains, satellite TV with international channels and Wi-Fi. Meeting/events rooms and business services are also available.
